metadata.title: PXTIDY 2 Pairs Ice Cream Socks Ice Cream Lover Gift If You Can Read This Bring Me Ice Cream Novelty Socks Love Desserts Gifts
features: ☆【QUALITY MATERIAL】We use 77% Cotton, 20% Polyamide and 3% Elastane to ensure our socks soft, comfortable, lightweight,stretchy and breathable. No fading, hold up well in the laundry.All the words or the picture are stitched directly into the socks instead of iron-on transfer, so it won't peel off.

☆【QUOTE SOCKS】Socks with words:"IF YOU CAN READ THIS BRING ME ICE CREAM",Cartoon ice cream socks for your sweet family, friends and lovers,The role of sweets is great, it will make people feel better,I hope people who receive this pair of socks will be in a good mood just seeing the pattern of ice cream.

☆【CASUAL SOCKS FOR ANY OCCASIONS】Our socks are great for everyday wear,the office, daily life.Just wear to work,on a date, party, reading in the library or bookstore,outdoor sports, or lounging around the house!

☆【PERFECT GIFT CHOICES】Perfect Gift for your beloved ones on Birthday, Anniversary,Holidays, like ‘Crazy Socks Day’, Mother’s Day, Christmas, Thanksgiving, Housewarming or Party Favor. Get this for yourself when you had yours, or get them for your family or friends.The lucky receiver will love this special gift.
description: ☆Raise your feet and show them to others. Someone will give you your favorite ice cream. It's very interesting☆And perfect for the funny quarantine gift and social distance gift. ☆【SIZE】All socks fit Unisex Size.sizing,Fits Shoe Size 4-15,there's no right or wrong way to wear them. Feet, hands, whatever. Left is right and right is left with these bad boys. ☆【PACKAGE INCLUDE】2 pairs of socks in a bag.Your socks will come packaged in a waterproof bag and and ready for gift giving.

title: grey casual socks
novelty socks great birthday christmas gift
